questions.title: Do you Wash your hands frequently?

answers.title: Nope
answers.description: Wash your hands frequently, Regularly and thoroughly clean your hands with an alcohol-based hand rub or wash them with soap and water. Why? Washing your hands with soap and water or using alcohol-based hand rub kills viruses that may be on your hands.

answers.title: Np
